modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update materal set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
